itemInfo.itemDesc: Increase Jump Height for 5 min.\n- Cooldown : 10 min.

item.name: Ash Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from an Ash Tree using a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Ash Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from an Ash Tree using a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Silver Azalea
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at the Northern Plain of Serendia and Lynch Farm Ruins. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Bear Blood
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be extracted from a bear corpse using a Fluid Collector.
